statements: SELECT * FROM commercial_property_appraisers;
SELECT property_id, property_address, valuation_amount FROM commercial_property_appraisers WHERE property_type = 'Office';
SELECT property_id, valuation_amount, valuation_date FROM commercial_property_appraisers WHERE valuation_amount > 100000;
SELECT property_id, property_address, property_type, valuation_date, valuation_amount FROM commercial_property_appraisers ORDER BY valuation_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_properties, AVG(valuation_amount) AS average_valuation FROM commercial_property_appraisers;
SELECT * FROM commercial_property_appraisers ORDER BY valuation_date DESC, property_id ASC
SELECT property_id, property_address, valuation_amount FROM commercial_property_appraisers WHERE valuation_amount > 100000 ORDER BY valuation_amount DESC
SELECT property_type, valuation_amount FROM commercial_property_appraisers WHERE property_type LIKE '%Office%'
SELECT * FROM commercial_property_appraisers WHERE valuation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT AVG(valuation_amount) AS average_valuation FROM commercial_property_appraisers
SELECT * FROM property_appraisers;
SELECT appraiser_id, appraiser_name FROM property_appraisers;
SELECT valuation_amount, valuation_date FROM property_valuations;
SELECT appraiser_name, join_date FROM property_appraisers;
SELECT * FROM property_valuations WHERE valuation_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM property_appraisers WHERE appraiser_id = 1 ORDER BY appraiser_name DESC;
SELECT appraiser_name, join_date FROM property_appraisers WHERE join_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appraiser_name;

SELECT appraiser_name, valuation_amount FROM property_appraisers JOIN property_valuations ON property_appraisers.appraiser_id = property_valuations.appraiser_id WHERE valuation_amount > 500000 ORDER BY valuation_amount DESC;

SELECT valuation_id, valuation_amount, appraiser_name FROM property_appraisers JOIN property_valuations ON property_appraisers.appraiser_id = property_valuations.appraiser_id WHERE valuation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY valuation_date;

SELECT PA.appraiser_name AS 'Appraiser Name', PV.valuation_amount AS 'Valuation Amount' FROM property_appraisers PA JOIN property_valuations PV ON PA.appraiser_id = PV.appraiser_id WHERE PA.appraiser_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY PV.valuation_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_appraisers ORDER BY appraiser_name DESC;
SELECT appraiser_name, appraiser_email FROM property_appraisers WHERE appraiser_id = 1;
SELECT property_address FROM properties WHERE valuation_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT valuation_amount, valuation_date FROM property_valuations WHERE valuation_amount > 100000;
SELECT property_id, property_address, property_type FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'House';
SELECT * FROM property_appraisers
SELECT appraiser_id, appraiser_name FROM property_appraisers ORDER BY appraiser_name DESC
SELECT property_id, property_address, property_type FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'House'
SELECT pa.appraiser_name, pv.valuation_date, pv.valuation_amount FROM property_appraisers pa JOIN property_valuations pv ON pa.appraiser_id = pv.appraiser_id
SELECT pv.*, p.property_address FROM property_valuations pv JOIN properties p ON pv.property_id = p.property_id
SELECT * FROM appraisers;
SELECT appraiser_name, appraiser_license_no FROM appraisers WHERE appraiser_id = 1;
SELECT property_address, property_type FROM properties ORDER BY property_type DESC;
SELECT valuation_id, valuation_date, property_value FROM valuations WHERE appraiser_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE historical_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM appraisers WHERE appraiser_license_no = '12345';
SELECT property_id, property_address, property_size FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'House' ORDER BY property_size DESC;
SELECT valuation_id, property_value FROM valuations WHERE valuation_date > '2022-01-01' AND valuation_date < '2022-12-31';

SELECT appraiser_name, appraiser_license_no, COUNT(*) AS total_valuations FROM appraisers JOIN valuations ON appraisers.appraiser_id = valuations.appraiser_id GROUP BY appraiser_name, appraiser_license_no;
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE property_id IN (SELECT property_id FROM valuations WHERE appraiser_id = 1001);
SELECT * FROM appraisers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM appraisers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT property_name, address FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'Residential';
SELECT valuation_amount, valuation_date FROM valuations ORDER BY valuation_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 10;
SELECT * FROM appraisers WHERE appraiser_id = 1;
SELECT property_name, property_type, address FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'Residential';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM appraisers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT valuation_amount, valuation_date FROM valuations WHERE valuation_amount > 5000 ORDER BY valuation_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, a.last_name, p.property_name FROM users u JOIN appraisals a ON u.user_id = a.appraiser_id JOIN properties p ON a.property_id = p.property_id;
